programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Monkey Twins
programme.desc: After the tragic loss of his lover, Neua learns the Monkey Muay Thai skills and vows to avenge her death. His lover’s sister who practices Chinese Kung Fu, suspects Neua is responsible for her sister's death but later uncovers that she was killed by an organized crime ring. Together, they join forces to uphold justice and seek vengeance.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law’s affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Ancient Empires
programme.desc: Alexander the Great of Macedon built one of the largest empires ever seen in just 13 years. Alexander not only has to contend with an increasingly powerful enemy, but also the loyalty of his men.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: It's a wet day in Montebello and King Darrell is on a mission to defend his throne, while Rene and Casey signal their intentions to undermine his plans. Kenny gets entirely bowled over by his locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: Barry shows up to the auction ready to learn, bringing along a present for a hustler. Brandi and Bozek get a firm grip on a smaller unit that raises their spirits. Ivy treats his son to a birthday locker.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Around the world and throughout history, people have reported seeing very similar types of unidentified objects in the sky. Now, Ancient Aliens is counting down the top ten alien craft.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: As new discoveries are uncovered in the triangle-shaped swamp and on Lot Five, the Oak Island team makes an incredible revelation in the Money Pit.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S2)
programme.desc: It's one of life's most confounding mysteries: What happens to us after we die? From heaven and hell to resurrection and reincarnation, we'll explore the remarkable possibilities of life after death.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: After finding Nazi artifacts at a sunken pier, Darrell continues his search to a site known as Target 3 where they find a possible component of a Nazi secret weapon that changes their investigation.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: When a former ranch investigator and government official returns to help the team with a new experiment, it leads to a shocking revelation.

programme.desc: Daniel and Dorien call in air support. Meanwhile, Ronnie and Ashley compete in a battle of the sexes. Black Rambo hunts for a legendary payday. While Bruce tries to save his season.

programme.title: Send In The Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger Ng Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Kahit Ako'y Busabos
programme.desc: Guiller (Ace Vergel), a young man who grew up in the slums of Tondo as a street toughie. In truth though, he was a kind-hearted man, who was forced to hide the good in him in order to survive in the cruel environment he grew up in.

programme.title: Kosa
programme.desc: Two convicts develop a close friendship because of their common goal which was to exact revenge for their loved ones. Their obssession of getting back at their enemies drove them to escape and to alienate all the people around them including their fellow inmates.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Mga Agila Sa Barkong Bato
programme.desc: Mga Agila Sa Barkong Bato

programme.title: Miguelito (Batang Rebelde)
programme.desc: Mayor Ven Herera (Eddie Garcia) is grooming his only son Miguelito "Mike" Herera (Aga Mulach) to be his predecessor. Mike, however, has other plans and live a happy go lucky life.

programme.title: Berdugo (Gabriel Lorenzo)
programme.desc: He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate frames him up and massacres his family.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.

programme.title: Row 4, The Baliktorians
programme.desc: Aruy (Dennis Padilla) and Aguy (Andrew E), heirs to a 10 million fortune, on a condition that they'll able to graduate. If not, the money would go to the school with so much at stake.

programme.title: Dunkin Donato
programme.desc: Donato and Buknoy has to win the championship of the interbarangay league. The money will be used to fund the many beneficial projects for the community. Will their talent be enough to win the game without having to resort to Magical Power?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 21
programme.desc: Michael pushes a soup machine fit for space travel. Then he reveals a shocking DIY ear wax removal kit and gives a magical massage. Finally, a trick throws a mover into a time warp when he sees the future and repeats the past.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 22
programme.desc: Working as a florist, Michael nukes flowers, sheds light on frog mutation, and turns an ant farm into a work of art. Later, he shocks a passerby in the park with his cat-dog, and then stuns someone else with a delivery from up above.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 23
programme.desc: Michael loses a credit card in a series of absorbing containers, and then in an art store, he shakes off sloppy handwriting to reveal fancy calligraphy. Later, a catering assistant gets spooked when chinaware sets itself.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 24
programme.desc: As a bank teller, Michael proves chipmunks are nature's accountants. Then while servicing a wake, Michael brings a toy to life, and later, he stuns a museum worker by restarting the evolutionary process for a fossilized creature.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 25
programme.desc: At a Best Buy, Michael gets textually active with the world's thinnest disposable phone - and things grind to a halt when he reveals an app that makes coffee. Plus, Michael debuts a new beauty invention that turns ugly.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Explore how city-states like Singapore safeguard sovereignty in a complex world. Host Kelly Latimer examines defence, diplomacy and resilience, revealing ancient wisdom and cutting-edge strategies.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.desc: The family of a missing Texas mother becomes concerned when they start receiving suspicious text messages from her phone.

programme.desc: When mother of two, Deanna Cook, missed her daily call to her mom, her family began to worry Deanna's 'stalker' might be involved. After texting and calling Deanna, her family called 911.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Police race across three states to catch a bus carrying an alleged gunman threatening to kill everyone onboard. On the coast of Florida, a toddler fights for her life after being found face down in a pool.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: A woman is dragged to her death in broad daylight; then a young mother is found with her throat slashed; and an ongoing battle between two gangs feels impossible to curtail as the body count rises.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)

programme.title: Green
programme.desc: An immersion in Antoine Auriol's childhood, in the heart of Reunion Island. The former world kitesurfing champion meets Alice, Antonin, Estelle, Franswa, Stephanie, Benoît, Bloody and Jean-FranCois. Here, shark attacks have made the sea dangerous: how to reconcile man with his natural environment?

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Amongst the artisans of fashion, there are the all-essential: Thomasine and Langlois-Martin; those who never give up: Alexandra Latour, producer of Calais lace; those who embody the future: stu-dents at the French Fashion Institute and Marco Ward; and those impossible to categorize: Tzuri Gueta and Michel Carel.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: A 4,000 square metre domus at the Vesunna Gallo-Roman Museum in Perigueux. Wendy Andreu structures each material with the same interest in creating unique objects. AlainPaul invites himself into a dance dressing room where clothes stretch and float. Jerome Clochard restores mosaics in Brittany.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu LA
programme.desc: The concerns surrounding the climate crisis are omnipresent in society and especially so for young people. Lourdenie, Antonin and Alie?nor are taking action and shining through their work to help save the planet.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: 54E Festival Interceltique De Lorient - Le Grand Spectacle
programme.desc: One of Europe’s most popular music events, the 54th Interceltic Festival of Lorient brings together thousands of artists from Brittany, Scotland, Ireland, Wales, Galicia, and Asturias.

programme.title: Le Crime Lui Va Si Bien
programme.desc: Gaby is technical advisor on the film set of a crime series, which leads to a somewhat eventful meeting with her ex-husband Antoine, who she hasn't seen in ten years. When a body is found on a rubbish tip, reality becomes stranger than fiction. Particularly as Antoine knew the victim...

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Amongst the artisans of fashion, there are the all-essential: Thomasine and Langlois-Martin; those who never give up: Alexandra Latour, producer of Calais lace; those who embody the future: stu-dents at the French Fashion Institute and Marco Ward; and those impossible to categorize: Tzuri Gueta and Michel Carel.

programme.title: La Vie Fantastique
programme.desc: As part of the Paris 2024 Cultural Olympiad, a colourful and energetic musical tale. Music, lyrics, songs, voices, hip-hop solos and a whole host of dances follow in quick succession. On stage, close to 200 young artists are plunged into a magical journey through distant, dreamlike lands.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: L'Oubliee D'amboise
programme.desc: After a concert at the Château d'amboise, the body of a violinist is found near Leonardo da Vinci's tomb in a position similar to that of Vitruvian Man, one of the artist's best-known drawings. A second murder soon follows, again inspired by Leonardo da Vinci's work.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nuï. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Koro has doubts about Laeti: she seems to be scheming something. He talks about it with Api.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Flavie has organised a sleepover but it all goes wrong when Zoe tries to find out who Tom was talking about when he wrote that he fancied someone.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: La Vie A Velo
programme.desc: Marion Rousse accompanies a couple who decided to leave the stress of the city. He is a cook, she is a hairdresser; thanks to their bicycles, their entire way of living has changed.

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: Welcome to the Camargue, the kingdom of guards, bulls and horses. Beyond the cliches, Gaëlle Hennekens and Roger Job, photographers, make Adrien discover the real treasures of this territory.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Secrets D'Histoire
programme.desc: Stealing from the rich to give to the poor: this was the motto of the famous Robin Hood, a generous and insolent hero. Did he really exist or was he just a popular fantasy in an impoverished England?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes the main character from her favorite graphic novel into the real world. // Hazel befriends a sentient dumpster named Danky after learning about humans' harmful effects on the environment.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
